title: Scrapbook, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: various weave structures.  Warp print
dimensions: Closed book: 46 x 30.5 x 10 cm (18 1/8 x 12 x 3 15/16 in. )
description: Scrapbook, assembled in New York containing 250 swatches of presumably French fabric. Several swatches are selvedge to selvedge and 1/4 yd high. Several colorways of various designs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scrapbook, early 20th century. Medium: silk
Technique: various weave structures.  Warp print. 1967-54-20.
